channel.title: Comments on: Oslo Conference and Catechisms
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Sammy Finkelman
item.dc:creator: Sammy Finkelman
item.description: You have to add what they may have known from what their family observed. That may have been different with every person. But surely they knew many details and customs about Pesach and some facts about Yom Kippur that they didn't get from school.
item.content:encoded: You have to add what they may have known from what their family observed. That may have been different with every person. But surely they knew many details and customs about Pesach and some facts about Yom Kippur that they didn’t get from school.
